type.name: contract_item
type.description: This select is a place holder for assignments of contract to elements of product data.

type.name: contract_organisation_or_person_in_organisation_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of an organization or a person in an organization to Contract instances.

type.name: contract_date_or_date_time_item
type.description: This select is a extends the assignments of a date or a date and time to Contract instances.

type.name: contract_approval_item
type.description: This select extends an approval_assignment to apply to Contract instances.

entity.name: Contract
entity.description: A Contract is an agreement to perform some action.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the identification of the contract assigned by the organisation

inverse.name: identifier
inverse.description: the optional organisation (or person in an organisation) that assigned and owns the contract id.

inverse.name: contractor
inverse.description: the optional organisations (or persons in organisations) that performs work required by the contract.

inverse.name: contract_date
inverse.description: the optional date or date and time when the contract was executed.

inverse.name: approval
inverse.description: the optional approvals for the contract.

entity.name: Contract_assignment
entity.description: A Contract_assignment assigns a Contract to product data.

explicit.name: assigned_contract
explicit.description: the Contract to be assigned to product data.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: the product data to which the Contract is assigned.
